metadata.title: CVE-2019-10184 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: undertow before version 2.0.23.Final is vulnerable to an information leakissue. Web apps may have their directory structures predicted throughrequests without trailing slashes via the api.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
